attributes.title: Gerald
attributes.actor: Ken Fletcher'''Gerald''' is a minor character in the Season 2

sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, there is no equivalent character. The only character by that name is Ser Gerald Gower, a knight in service to [[Stannis Baratheon]] whose role in the books is very minor.
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 2]]===
He is a groom in the army of [[King]] [[Renly Baratheon]]. He was injured by a horse but recovered well. Renly greets him when he takes [[Catelyn Stark]] on a tour of his camp in the [[Stormlands]].<ref>"[[What is Dead May Never Die]]"</ref>
